document_data.name: Belltoll Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Belltoll Street''' was a slightly curved street that began on the [[The Wide]], ran west and ended at a moot in front of the home of [[sage]] [[Ragefast]] in the [[Baldur's Gate/Upper City|Upper City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]].
document_data.Location: Belltoll Street began at one of the western enrages into The Wide, where the [[Hlath Estate]] stood, on the edge of the [[Temples District]]. From there, the street cut through the entire Temples District, passing between the [[Portyr Estate]] and the [[High Hall]], crossing [[Windspell Street]] where the [[Vanthampur Villa]] and the [[Helm and Cloak]] stood. Belltoll Street continued moving west into the [[Manorborn]] district, crossing [[Sornbanner Street]], slightly curving north, and passing the [[Lady's Hall]] temple, until reaching the moot in front of Ragefast's manse.{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20220221195407/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_1112-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed Nov â€“ Dec 2004| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
